game.name: Flat Crossbar Challenge
game.description:
Football games are the first choice to play online for many boys and girls. If you are also amongst the ones for whom soccer is the best online game to kill time, Flat Crossbar Challenge can prove to be a nice bet. You have to play the role of a football player in this brand new arcade challenge. The best part is that it also comes with the simple controls and seamless gameplay. So you cannot stop yourself from playing it for hours if you give it a single try.

Your objective in this html5 soccer game is to hit the crossbar to score 50 points. It is not going to be easy friends since this is a time-based game so you have to hit the crossbar as many times as you can in the limited time period. Be careful and try to release your ball with the accurate power to score high! Also try to beat the clock to create your highest score in this fun soccer arcade game.

You have to put your football playing abilities to the test to get a high score in this cool sports game. Make sure to judge the power bar perfectly and feel free to change the power of your shots accordingly. Keep hitting the crossbar repeatedly until the time stops in this one of the best spots games for boys! Gain the maximum number of points to prove yourself as the best soccer player! Check out more football games on our website and have fun with your friends, no download required!
